mapper.select:
select '' as origin, '' as PTVehicleIDNumber, '' as SubRouteIdentityNumber, -1 as BusEventCodeNumber, -1 as BusRunCodeNumber, false as LastPTVehicle, '010000' as EndNodeZoneIDNumber, -1 as EndNodeRouteSequence, -1 as BusTotalSeatsNumber, -1 as BusPassengerNumber, -1 as BusRemainSeatsNumber,
now() as MessageGenerationTime, '' as NodeZoneIDNumber, -1 as NodeRouteSequence, now() as NodeZoneEntryTime, now() as NodeZoneExitTime, -1 as NodeZoneTripTime,
36.0 as PTVehicleCoordinateLati, 127.0 as PTVehicleCoordinateLong, now() as PTVehicleCollectedTime, -1 as PTVehicleCollectedCycleTime
